author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Switch Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.02
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Switch Inc:
* SWITCH ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE $97.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $99.8 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $423 MILLION TO $440 MILLION * QTRLY CHURN OF 0.1%, FLAT COMPARED TO SAME QUARTER IN 2017
* QUARTERLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.05 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
